mapper.select:
select m.alarm_no, m.alarm_member_no, m.alarm_division, m.alarm_contents_pk, n.chatlog_no, n.member_no, n.chatroom_no, n.chatlog_log, n.chatlog_division, n.chatlog_date, p.member_id
from alarm_chat as m
left join chatlog as n on m.alarm_contents_pk = n.chatlog_no
left join member as p on n.member_no = p.member_no
where m.alarm_no=#{alarm_no}
